description:
Bright and modern studio in Kips Bay, with a great view of the Empire State building. 

Walking distance to 5th Avenue, Empire State, Madison Sq. Park, Rooftop Bars. 

Safe and quiet neighbourhood. 

Elevator with easy access.
Washer and dryer in unit.
Fully equipped kitchen.
24h gym.
Rooftop terrace.

Great spot for couples, adventurers, business travelers.
name: Modern Apartment with Empire State Building view
review: The place was absolutely perfect for a weekend trip to NY. Very clean, comfortable and well located. The apartment is exactly how it's shown in the pictures and the view also superb.
